name: 裘百明
objective: 本課主旨在設計課程，提供練習，俾使學生嫻熟各式的英語測驗，如全民英檢、托福測驗、TOEIC 測驗或類似性質的測驗，希冀能夠藉由本課程的修習，提升學生不斷的學習外國語的興致，並且，藉由通過考試取得證照，增加未來職場的競爭力。
schedule:
Week 1  course orientation and introduction to TOEIC test
Week 2  listening required skills
Week 3  listening with photos
Week 4  listening: responses
Week 5  listening: short talks
Week 6  listening: passage
week 7  reading: sentence completion
week 8  review
week 9  mid-term exam
week 10  reading comprehension
week 11 reading comprehesion
week 12 listening: advanced skills
week 13 listening: adanced practice
week 14 listening : final review
week 15 reading: advanced skills
week 16 reading: advanced practice
week 17 reading: final review
week 18: final exam
scorePolicy:
mid-term exam 30%
final exam  30%
quiz 20%
in-class assigment 20%
materials: textbook: New TOEIC: Skills and Strategies, LiveABC
